job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: ltpgtActiveLogic Labs designs and develops custom webbased and mobile software applications for a myriad of different industries and in several different technologies Were looking for experienced and versatile software engineers who arent afraid of working as a team exploring new technologies and pushing their personal skills to their full potentialampnbspltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtWhats in it for youltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtSalary range 80k  130k Depending on skill ampamp experienceltligtltligtCompetitive total compensation packageampnbspltligtltligtFull Benefits 50 of Medical premiums paid for by companyltligtltligtCompany paid Disability and Life insuranceltligtltligtFlexible schedule ampamp work locationltligtltligtLocally owned friendly fun atmosphereltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtTechnical Qualifications ampamp SkillsltstronggtltpgtltpgtWere not worried about whether your experience is perfectly aligned with everything we use but more that you want to learn and bring your experience building solid applications Here are some of the things we doltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtFrontEnd Web TechltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtCSSHTML SCSS WebpackltligtltligtBootstrapltligtltligtVueJSltligtltligtReactltligtltligtJavascript  JQueryltligtltligtAngularltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtBackEnd Web TechltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtPHP  Laravel  SymphonyltligtltligtNET  CltligtltligtJavascript  NodeJS  ExpressltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtLowerLevel TechltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtPythonltligtltligtC  CltligtltligtJavaltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtRequired Qualificationsltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt3 Years of professional development experience School work does not countltligtltligtGIT Source Control Pull Requests Code ReviewsltligtltligtRelational Database Experience MySql SQL PostgresltligtltligtDependency Management Composer NPM Webpack Bowerltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgt
